forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 8C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 48F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 7C. WNW winds shifting to NNE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 44F. WNW winds shifting to NNE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
